hero.title: Agentric AI
hero.subtitle: AI-Driven Development with Human Oversight
hero.description: We combine advanced AI agents with expert human guidance to deliver software faster, smarter, and more efficiently. Every project is orchestrated by Rommel, our Agent Master, ensuring quality and precision in every line of code.

introduction.title: The Future of Software Development
introduction.content: Agentric AI represents a fundamental shift in how software is built. By leveraging AI agents for routine tasks, code generation, and testing while maintaining human oversight for architecture, strategy, and critical decisions, we achieve unprecedented speed and quality. This approach allows us to deliver enterprise-grade solutions at a fraction of traditional costs and timelines.

featuredProduct.title: Spreadsheet Automation Platform
featuredProduct.description: Transform manual spreadsheet workflows into automated systems with AI-generated interactive mockups delivered during discovery calls. We analyze your current processes, design streamlined solutions, and provide working demonstrations same-day. Complete with workflow documentation, ROI analysis, and deployment-ready prototypes.
features: AI-generated interactive mockups delivered during discovery calls
Complete workflow documentation and ROI analysis

benefits.title: Accelerated Delivery
benefits.description: AI agents handle repetitive coding tasks, automated testing, and documentation generation, allowing us to deliver projects 3-5x faster than traditional development approaches.

benefits.title: Cost Efficiency
benefits.description: By automating routine development work, we reduce project costs by up to 70% while maintaining high code quality and comprehensive test coverage.

benefits.title: Consistent Quality
benefits.description: AI agents apply best practices uniformly across all code, ensuring consistent style, thorough documentation, and comprehensive error handling throughout your project.

benefits.title: Human Expertise
benefits.description: Every decision that matters is made by experienced developers. AI handles the mechanics; humans handle the strategy, architecture, and innovation.

benefits.title: Modern Cloud Architecture
benefits.description: We leverage Render for lightning-fast deployments and real CI/CD pipelines. Built entirely on open-source technologies like top-shelf Node.js and Linux, we pile on the savings while delivering enterprise-grade performance. All these proven, cost-effective technologies mean lower costs for you.

items.title: AI-Accelerated Web Applications
items.description: Full-stack web applications built with AI assistance for frontend, backend, and database layers. We use AI agents for component generation, API development, and automated testing while maintaining human oversight for architecture and user experience design.

items.title: Spreadsheet Automation Platform
items.description: Transform manual spreadsheet workflows into automated systems with AI-generated interactive mockups delivered during discovery calls. We analyze your current processes, design streamlined solutions, and provide working demonstrations same-day. Complete with workflow documentation, ROI analysis, and deployment-ready prototypes.

items.title: Legacy System Modernization
items.description: Transform outdated systems into modern, maintainable codebases. AI agents analyze legacy code, generate documentation, and assist in refactoring while human experts guide the modernization strategy and ensure business logic integrity.

items.title: API Development & Testing Suite
items.description: End-to-end API development with AI-generated endpoints, comprehensive test suites, and automated documentation. Human experts design the architecture and ensure security, scalability, and quality.

items.title: Code Review & Optimization
items.description: AI-powered code analysis identifies performance bottlenecks, security vulnerabilities, and maintainability issues. Human experts provide strategic recommendations, implement optimizations, and conduct penetration testing to validate security posture. Comprehensive assessments include static code analysis, dynamic security testing, and vulnerability scanning.

items.title: Local LLM Integration
items.description: Set up and integrate local Large Language Models like Llama and Mistral into your applications. We handle installation, configuration, and optimization to give you the power of AI while keeping your data private and on-premises. Perfect for organizations with strict data security requirements.

items.title: LLM API Integration
items.description: Seamlessly integrate your applications with leading AI providers including ChatGPT, Claude, and Grok. We handle authentication, rate limiting, error handling, and cost optimization to ensure reliable and efficient AI-powered features in your software.

items.title: Cloud Deployment & CI/CD
items.description: We use Render for lightning-fast deployments and real continuous integration/continuous deployment pipelines. Built on open-source foundations—top-shelf Node.js, Linux, and battle-tested frameworks—our infrastructure is cost-effective, reliable, and scales with your business. Modern cloud architecture with maximum savings.

agentMaster.name: Rommel
agentMaster.title: Agent Master
agentMaster.bio: Rommel founded VSol Software and has spent over 15 years architecting enterprise software solutions for global clients. As Agent Master, he orchestrates AI agents to handle development tasks while maintaining strategic oversight of every project. His expertise spans full-stack development, cloud architecture, and agile methodologies, ensuring that AI acceleration never comes at the cost of quality or maintainability.
agentMaster.quote: AI agents are remarkable tools, but software development is still fundamentally a human endeavor. My role is to ensure that we harness AI's speed and consistency while applying human judgment where it matters most.

cta.title: Ready to Accelerate Your Development?
cta.description: Discover how Agentric AI can transform your next project. Get faster delivery, lower costs, and higher quality.
